ygData.subject: Re: Evocation!
ygData.msgSnippet: We re not nukers, so this spell isn t really all that needed anyway.  I used Chaotic Feedback very infrequently until level 12 because of the amount of mana it
ygData.messageBody:
We're not nukers, so this spell isn't really all that needed anyway. I used
Chaotic Feedback very infrequently until level 12 because of the amount of
mana it took. At level 12 I followed the same tactics I always used, but I
tried to finish off the critter with CF. By level 14 I had Evocation maxed.

On a similar thread I didn't start using Sanity Warp (level 16 DD) until
level 20. Generally speaking I only use our DD spells to interrupt other
spell casters.

Rizzin Diamoure
E'ci

----- Original Message -----
From: Rich Hitz <Rich.Hitz@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 10:14 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Evocation!


> From: Rich Hitz <Rich.Hitz@...>
>
> OK, what happened here?
> I just scanned a list of Enchanter spells and see we get out first
Evocation
> spell at 8th level and it's mana cost is a whopping 45. Chaotic Feedback
has
> a long recovery time, has a poor Mana/Damage ratio, and will fizzle like
> crazy early on.
> At 8th level the skill will max at 45. If you haven't spent training
points
> in it each level, it will be a very time consuming action of getting this
> skill to where you don't fizzle just thinking about casting it. Does
anyone
> have a quick solution to raise this skill quickly besides standing around
> casting it on yourself? At level 8 I will have 30 training points to spend
> as I have 10 left still. If I max my Jewelcraft at 21 and pump the
remaining
> 9 into Evocation I will still suck but it will not take me nearly as long
as
> if I started with a "0". Yes, I made the mistake of priming it with 1
point
> within my first 2 levels before I saw when we get the first Evocation
spell.
>
> I spent 15 minutes last night incresing my Divination from 1 to 23 while
> casting Sense Magic (mana drain of 5). I also spent time increasing
> Abjuration from 3 to 18 last night with Minor Shielding. Recovery time was
> ok, but the thought of this for evocation gives me a headache. It could
take
> your entire night of self-casting to get this maxxed. This assumes you
> intend on not wanting to die in combat after 9 fizzles in a row and
becoming
> OOM while a Green MoB kicks the crud out of you.
>
> Am I crazy, or should we have a low level Evocation spell? Even if it does
> nothing like Sense Magic, I would spend the $ to get it.
>
> Anyone else have thoughts on this?
>
> --
> Bahir
> 4th Season DE Enchanter
> Bertoxx
